content:
WritingCancelledEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents a method that will handle the stem.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCancelled event.

In this Article

public delegate void WritingCancelledEventHandler(object sender, WritingCancelledEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
WritingCancelledEventHandler
